description_txt: stated on June 15, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: In 2008, "33.2 percent of those who voted early on the last Sunday before Election Day were African-American, while 23.6 percent were Hispanic."

description_txt: stated on June 8, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: "70 percent of the people who voted" on June 5, 2012, "just didn’t feel comfortable with the recall of the governor," weakening any idea that Wisconsin is "fully behind this Walker agenda."

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2012 in a TV ad.:
quote_txt: "As Virginia lost over 65,000 jobs, (Tim) Kaine put partisan ambitions first" by serving as DNC chairman during the last year of his governorship.

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2012 in a town hall-style meeting:
quote_txt: "My opponent, in 2008, had contributions investigated by the federal government."

description_txt: stated on May 7, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Since the beginning of the economic downturn in FY 2008, the state workforce has been reduced by 12.4 percent as part of overall cost savings measures to balance the budget to reduce revenues."

description_txt: stated on June 11, 2012 in speech on the RI House floor:
quote_txt: Rhode Island has the "worst maintained bridges in the United States of America . . . and we have the second worst maintained roads [behind] Alaska."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2012 in a widely circulated posting:
quote_txt: "Nearly 60% of all occupants of HUD properties in U.S. are illegals."

description_txt: stated on June 21, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Women (are) paid 77 cents on the dollar for doing the same work as men."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2012 in a radio interview.:
quote_txt: "Most of Ted Cruz’s money comes from Washington, from outside the state of Texas."

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2012 in a statement on Central Florida News 13’s 'Political Connections':
quote_txt: "There’s no wildlife" in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

description_txt: stated on June 12, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: Since President Barack Obama took office, "you have 1,700 employees just at the Department of Transportation" earning over $170,000.

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2012 in a video posted on YouTube:
quote_txt: "(Assembly Democrats) wanted to raise the gas tax by $2.4 billion. We said no to that....They’re down on the ground. They’re sweating. They’re twitching. It’s ugly, ‘cause I keep saying no."

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "Congressman Renacci is under FBI investigation."

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2012 in an advertisement:
quote_txt: Says 97 cents of every dollar played "represents over $500 million dollars that is returned to Oregonians every year to help support job creation, schools, state parks and watersheds."

description_txt: stated on June 19, 2012 in on the Internet:
quote_txt: "Less than 2 percent of illegals are picking crops, but 41 percent are on welfare."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2012 in an interview on Fox News:
quote_txt: "A million people a year come into the U.S. legally. No other country even comes close to that figure."

description_txt: stated on June 15, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Says President Obama's new immigration plan "is amnesty."

description_txt: stated on June 8, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: "The Koch brothers alone gave twice as much money to Scott Walker as the total amount of money raised by Tom Barrett."

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2012 in a conference call with reporters:
quote_txt: Says that under President Obama, there’s been a substantial increase in federal government jobs.

description_txt: stated on June 16, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: "There is no Plan B" if the transportation referendum is not passed by voters.

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2012 in a TV ad. :
quote_txt: Tim Kaine urged "$500 billion in Medicare cuts."

description_txt: stated on June 15, 2012 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "Vagina. Because apparently, saying that word in the Michigan State House of Representatives can get you a two-day ban from speaking on the floor."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2012 in on the Internet:
quote_txt: "More than 43 percent of all food stamps are given to illegals."

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2012 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "In 2011, NJ economy ranked 47th--at the bottom with Alabama, Mississippi & Wyoming. Under Christie, NJ is falling behind."

description_txt: stated on June 12, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says, "Less than half of all states have legal protections on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity, despite the fact that LGBT Americans report employment discrimination and unemployment at much higher rates than the U.S. average."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2012 in a speech to the Republican Party of Texas convention in Fort Worth.:
quote_txt: Barack Obama has "provided guns to Mexican drug cartels."

description_txt: stated on June 12, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "When Mitt Romney was governor, Massachusetts ... (had) more debt per person than any other state in the country."

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2012 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "Romneycare covers abortion, illegal immigrants and has a public option. Obamacare does not."

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2012 in a blog post:
quote_txt: The Americans for Tax Reform pledge "relates to new taxes that were going to be initiated by legislative action."

description_txt: stated on May 25, 2012 in a debate.:
quote_txt: "Before I was governor, tuition was skyrocketing and we stopped that. We capped and then we froze college tuition."
